owl:Ontology.ns:useGuidelines: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. Please refer to https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ for guidelines.
owl:Ontology.terms:creator: Poornima S P Ravishankar
owl:Ontology.terms:description: The Cognition, Culture & Language (CCL) ontology is based on the analytical framework of Cultural Linguistics developed by Professor Farzad Sharifian. CCL is a content ontology, which models the various aspects of culture as it is experienced within human cognition.The purpose of the CCL ontology is to model the domain of Cultural conceptualizations in general and the analytical framework of Cultural Linguistics, in particular. The ontology is intended to provide users a conceptual schema where their research findings can be documented. The ontology will also enable establishing linkage between documented information, leading to the discovery of new relationships made possible by reasoning.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Category Invokes Schema
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: The schema that a category invokes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Event
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Contains Some Event

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Information About
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Contains Information About

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Metonym
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Metonym contained in the metaphor.Metonymy is the practice of using a concept which is a part of or closely associated with another to reference it.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Submetaphor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Other metaphors contained within the this metaphor.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Behaviour
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Encoded Behaviour within some schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Category
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more categories encoded in the schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Context
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Encoded Context within some schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Cultural Agreement Structure
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Some cultural belief/norm/value encoded within a schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Cultural Belief
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Some cultural belief encoded within a schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Cultural Norm
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Some cultural norm encoded within a schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Cultural Value
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Some cultural value encoded within a schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Metaphor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more metaphors encoded in the schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Rule
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Encoded Rule within some schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Schema
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Sub-schemas encoded in the schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Encodes Social Practice
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Encoded Social Practice within some schema

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Alignment Relationship With
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns alignment objective of a concept with another which it wants to attain alignment objective - Rule/Norm/Value/Belief

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Action
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated actions

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Artefact
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Some Associated Artefact

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Behaviour
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated behaviours especially for rule and behaviour schemas

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Belief
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cultural beliefs

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Category
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Categories subsumed in a category hierarchy
One or more associated categories

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cognitive Category
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cognitive categories

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cognitive Schema
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cognitive schemas

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Agreement Structure
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Has some cultural belief/value/norm
The underlying belief/value or other cultural structure which led to a particular target being mapped to a particular source in a metaphor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Category
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cultural categories

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Descriptor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns the name of the culture for which the data (instances) are being created

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Metaphor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cultural metaphors

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Norm
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated norms.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Schema
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cultural schemas

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Cultural Value
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more cultural values associated with the concept.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Entity
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated entities

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Exemplar
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cultural exemplars

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Hierarchy
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated category hierarchies

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Language
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition:
Language associated with the culture.
This is not a transitive property as it is possible that the same language is associated with different cultures. For instance, English.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Mental Structure
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated schemas,categories or metaphors

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Metaphor
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated metaphors

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Rule
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated rules

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Schema
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated schemas

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Social Practice
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated social practices

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Symbol
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated cultural symbols

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Category Exemplar
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Has Associated Category exemplar(s) which is/are the most representative example of a category

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Category In Current Level
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns categories to the current level of some category hierarchy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Context
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Has some associated context

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Current Context
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates the current context

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Domain
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates a domain as a domain of a metaphor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Immediate Cultural Context
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Refers to a frame of reference which is more general and relevant than the general context - Like War, Political event such as Brexit, a social media trend etc.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Intended Outcome
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates an intended outcome to the concept.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Linguistic System
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates a linguistic system with a language

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Location
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates a location with the concept

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Membership Rule
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: One or more associated membership rules

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Pre-conceptualization
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates other mental structures with the concept

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Prior Context
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a context as a prior context

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Prototype
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates an entity with some category as its prototype

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Relevance In Time Period
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Indicates relevance and assigns a time period of relevance to the concept

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Root Category
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a category as the root of a hierarchy.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Significance In Time Period
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Indicates some level of significance and assigns a corresponding time period of significance to the concept

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Source Domain
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates a domain as a source domain of a metaphor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has SubCategory
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Has some associated sub-category

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Sub-domain
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates a domain as a subset of another

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Superordinate Category
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Has some associated superordinate category

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Target Domain
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates a domain as a target domain of a metaphor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is A Behaviour Associated With
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Please see inverse property for the description.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is A Behaviour Encoded In
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Please see inverse property for the description.

owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Please see inverse property for the description.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Action Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an action type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Artefact Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an artefact type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Assertion Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an assertion type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Belief Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a belief type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Category Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a category type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Context Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a context type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Domain Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a domain type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Entity Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an entity type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Exemplar Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a cultural exemplar type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Hierarchy Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a hierarchy type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Metaphor Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a metaphor type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Norm Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a norm type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Outcome Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an outcome type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Rule Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a rule type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Schema Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a schema type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Symbol Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a cultural symbol type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Value Type
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a cultural value type to the concept forming the domain of this property. Type values can vary based on context and application.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Prior Context Of
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Please see inverse property for the description.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Is Root Category Of
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Please see inverse property for the description.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Makes Reference To Entity
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: What event or entity is the primary motivation in the generation of the metaphor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Overlaps With Place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: (From CRM) - This symmetric property allows the instances of E53 Place with overlapping geometric extents to be associated with each other. It does not specify anything about the shared area.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Borders With Place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: (From CRM)- This symmetric property allows the instances of E53 Place which share common borders to be related as such.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Falls Within Place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: (From CRM) - This property identifies an instance of E53 Place that falls wholly within the extent of another E53 Place. It addresses spatial containment only, and does not imply any relationship between things or phenomena occupying these places.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Place
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition:
CRM Property
Property to associate places enclosed within current instance.

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Has Participant
owl:ObjectProperty.skos:definition: Associates an entity with an event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Base Relation Contains Belief
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Base cognitive belief/perceptions on which base relation is based

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Idea
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Ideas involved in the concept

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Idea In Schema
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Ideas involved in the schema

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Contains Idea In Theme
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Ideas involved in the central theme of the schema

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Action Quality
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a quality to an action - for instance, Positive, Negative, Neutral/ Any other type classification for the associated context

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Alignment Objective
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Description of the objective. Type of alignment - In Alignment/In disalignment/Neutral.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Analogical Element
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: A basic dimension such as movement, colour, feeling, temperature etc. in terms of which the comparison or mapping is achieved within the metaphor. At least one.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Assertion
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates a target state assertion which is true when all its necessary conditions are satisfied. The 'Then'.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Associated Linguistic Expression
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Has associated expressions in language

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Beginning In Time
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates the beginning of some temporal entity- expressed in terms of time

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Behaviour Quality
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a quality to a behaviour - for instance, Positive, Negative, Neutral/ Any other type classification for the associated context

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Cause Of Origination
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Any associated social/political/geo-political causes of origination of this metaphor.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Condition
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: associates an initial state which needs to be satisfied for a target state to potentially be true. The 'If'.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Cultural Relevance Weight
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a quantifiable measure of the relevance is the metaphor at a cultural level

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Current Significance
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns current significance based on some scale(Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Current Significance Weight
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns current significance weight based on some scale(Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Current Social Relevance
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Describes how relevant is the metaphor at a cultural level

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Description
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Natural Language description of the class

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Ending In Time
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates the ending of some temporal entity- expressed in terms of time

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Entity Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a name to the entity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Exemplar Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a name to the cultural exemplar

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Expected Component
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns some expected component of some behaviour type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has General Connotation
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates a positive, negative, neutral or any other scale quality to the expression

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Historical Significance
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns historical significance based on some scale(Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Historical Significance Weight
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns historical significance weight based on some scale(Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Intended Meaning
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates some meaning intended to be commuicated through the metaphor

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Name
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Name of the instance

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Origin
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: A proprty which tracks the origin, if known. For instance, schemas which may have come into origin due to some well-known events like significant national events (as opposed to ones which are gradually and systematically formed)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Origin Of Expression Used
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an origin, if known, to the particular linguistic expression used

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Origin Of Intended Meaning
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns an origin, if known, to the intended meaning linguistic expression used, for metaphors

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Perceived Component
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns some expected component of some behaviour type

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Priority
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a priority value to the cultural value (Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Quality
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a quality to a behaviour - for instance, Positive, Negative, Neutral/ Any other type classification for the associated context

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Recurring Schedule
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a recurring schedule to an event

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Relationship Between Theme Entities
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a relationship between the theme entities in a schema theme

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Significance
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns significance based on some scale(Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Significance Weight
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns significance weight based on some scale(Decided by the user or application)

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Symbolism
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates a cultural symbol with the symbolism

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Theme
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates a schema theme (summary of the schema such as 'LIFE IS A JOURNEY') with the corresponding schema

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Total Levels In Hierarchy
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns total levels in a category hierarchy

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Has Usage Frequency
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns some frequency of usage (sclae decided by user or application) to the metaphor

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Is At Hierarchy Level
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Indicates which level in a category hierarchy, a category is at

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Is Of Artefact Category
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns a categry such as Linguistic, behavioural, object (textual/archaeological/art) etc. to the cultural artefact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Is Summarized As
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Associates a summary to a domain, context, belief or any such entity which requires explanation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Membership Rule Has Weightage
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns some weightage to a membership rule. This is relevant to category memberships, especially when the criteria are fuzzy.

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: foaf:gender
owl:DatatypeProperty.skos:definition: Assigns Gender to a human or a thing(as seen in some languages)

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Linguistic System
owl:Class.skos:definition: dcterms:Description "Written, spoken, sign, and computer languages are linguistic systems."

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Action
owl:Class.skos:definition: Movement(Specifically travel over a distance)/Speech/Silence/Non-action/Facial or other Gesture/Emotion expression

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Action Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies actions into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Artefact Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural artefacts into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Assertion Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies rule assertions into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Behaviour
owl:Class.skos:definition: Actions of agents within a situation/condition/circumstance

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Belief Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural beliefs into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Category
owl:Class.skos:definition:
A set of classification criteria to classify entities/situations and other structures encoded as a mental structure.
In general, categories are how one groups together various entities.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Category Hierarchy
owl:Class.skos:definition:
A classification system with categories and their subordinate categories arranged from the most general to the most specific. This will be conceptually built by inference.
This is a separate class since it is an organizational structure. Although, it may exist within the mental space, it is an abstract conceptual 'meta' structure.
This class serves to identify a hierarchy.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Category Membership Rule
owl:Class.skos:definition: A membership rule that is forms a part of some category

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Category Organization
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class denoting some organization of categories, either in a hierarchy or in the same level.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Category Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies categories into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Category Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural categories into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: City
owl:Class.skos:definition: Usually, a geographical centre of social, political, financial activity.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cognitive Category
owl:Class.skos:definition: A set of classification criteria to classify entities/situations and other structures encoded as a mental structure

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cognitive Metaphor
owl:Class.skos:definition: This functions as sort of the atomic metaphor i.e. the simplest metaphors created using foundational schemas and categories.e.g. Feelings in terms of temperature.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cognitive Schema
owl:Class.skos:definition: A basic type of cognitive mental structure which encodes situations, rules, norms, behaviours etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collective Mental Structure
owl:Class.skos:definition: The conceptualizations developed by a cultural community. This is a cognitive structure, arising at the cultural (group) level.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Context
owl:Class.skos:definition: A frame of reference for understanding situations/behaviour/actions/language. This can be current or prior context. Prior context is context of which one has knowledge through experience or learning or simply by being exposed to it sometime in the past. This is a string datatype and is to be provided in the form of a description.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Context Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies contexts into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Country
owl:Class.skos:definition: A socio-political structure encompassing a group of people

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Artefact
owl:Class.skos:definition: A cultural artefact is one which is produced and mediated by cultural agents i.e. it is a product of culture.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Belief
owl:Class.skos:definition: A belief in relation to religion/philosophy/social rules and behaviour, for insance, held by the cultural community

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Category
owl:Class.skos:definition: A set of classification criteria to classify entities/situations and other structures encoded as a mental structure

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Element
owl:Class.skos:definition: Any entity or process arising in and out of cultural activity

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Entity
owl:Class.skos:definition: An entity that has a cultural flavour or attribute.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Entity Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural entities into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Exemplar
owl:Class.skos:definition: An exemplar is of great significance and is somehow distinctly representative of the culture both within and outside it. It is usually the abstract idea of an entity usually a person displaying certain characteristics, may or may not be well-known persons. In case of an abstract idea of a person, the entity should accordingly be assigned as an abstract one.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Metaphor
owl:Class.skos:definition: A metaphor within the culture with distinctly cultural components such as the domain used within the expression or the expression itself.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Norm
owl:Class.skos:definition:
Cultural norms are share, agreedupon beliefs and practices shared by the cultural community.
If there is a norm which applies in all contexts, then this can be encoded as applying to a context individual whic is a high-level, general context. If associating a rule for this norm, the initial condition(s) of the asscoiated rule can simply be 'All conditions' or 'Always, for example.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Schema
owl:Class.skos:definition: Collection of various cognitive schemas, cognitive and cultural categories and asociated metaphors

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Symbol
owl:Class.skos:definition: A cultural symbol could be any sort of entity that has some symbolism within the culture.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Value
owl:Class.skos:definition:
Values are core ideas which stem from the beliefs underlying them and manifest within the practices of a cultural group.
The generic Description field is mandatory for this class since it will be used to record the cultural value instead of having a specific property to achieve the same thing.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Culture Descriptor
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class records the details of the society and culture for which the Cultural Linguistic framework is being modeled. Place is not a mandatory property since there are nomadic cultures in the world. However, the regions involved with their movement can still be coded.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dialect
owl:Class.skos:definition: A flavour of a language which may be associated with some group or subset of the cultural community. There may or may not be a region(place) associated with it.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Domain
owl:Class.skos:definition:
A domain is a constrained subset of a larger body of knowledge. A domain can contain its own sub-domains and sub-domains are domains in their own right. When different aspects of a domain are seleted for encoding, they should be coded in the form of sub-domain individuals.
In this ontology, a domain doesn't have a significance by itself. It may however be associated with certain contexts where applicable and can gain significance within each associated context.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Domain Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies domains into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Domain Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural domains into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entity
owl:Class.skos:definition: An entity physical or abstract or an event which exists within reality either by form or by the recognition of its existence. For instance, a person, place, thing, organisation, event, time etc. with some concrete or abstract form of manifestation within physical reality.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Entity Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies entities into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Exemplar Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural exemplars into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hierarchy Level
owl:Class.skos:definition:
A classification system with categories and their subordinate categories arranged from the most general to the most specific. This will be conceptually built by inference.
This is a separate class since it is an organizational structure. Although, it may exist within the mental space, it is an abstract conceptual 'meta' structure.
This class corresponds to one level within a hierarchy. Different branches at the same level should be coded using different instances with their respective superordinate category.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Hierarchy Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies category hierarchies into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Idea
owl:Class.skos:definition: An idea is a concept which is either new or unseen or not completely concrete in understanding.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Intended Outcome
owl:Class.skos:definition: The target state/goal to be achieved by conforming to a certain rule or manipulating variables such as behaviour.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Language
owl:Class.skos:definition: A system of communication and shared expression and interpretation using sounds, symbols and expressions

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Membership Rule
owl:Class.skos:definition: A rule deciding membership in some set

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Memory
owl:Class.skos:definition: A knowledge representation of some past experience

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Metaphor
owl:Class.skos:definition: A system of entity or subset of entities and/or processes which is viewed and understood within the paradigm of another.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Metaphor Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies metaphors into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Metaphor Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural metaphors into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Non-Human Person
owl:Class.skos:definition: Animals, fictional persons, mythological figures etc. can be added in this class.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Norm Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural norms into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Outcome Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies intended outcomes into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Physical
owl:Class.skos:definition: Entities in the Physical wrold/reality

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Province
owl:Class.skos:definition: Some well-dfined sub-division of a country, usually divided for administrative and political purposes

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Region
owl:Class.skos:definition: An arbitrary grouping of physical space based on some criteria. A region,for insatnce, could include only cities of some parts of a province, some provinces or some countries.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rule
owl:Class.skos:definition: A combination of initial conditions which when satisfied render some target state valid

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rule Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies rules into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Schema
owl:Class.skos:definition: Schemas are organizing structures encode knowledge about situations, events, roles, rules, expectations, goals etc.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Schema Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies schemas into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cultural Schema Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural schemas into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Social Practice
owl:Class.skos:definition: A practice which even if not unique, is distinct to the culture. It has some attached cultural value to it. A social practice may be even to do 'nothing' in some given context.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sub-domain
owl:Class.skos:definition: A subset of a domain. A sub-domain is a well-defined in some sense and able to be identified as such.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Symbol Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural symbols into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temporal
owl:Class.skos:definition: An entity existing primarily in terms of time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thing
owl:Class.skos:definition: A thing is meant to represent an object - natural or man-made and usually considered to be inanimate, but there may be exceptions to this such as trees.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A category which delineates things with a certain attribute from others within the same class. The types for the sub-classes are not some range of fixed values but are decided based on context, necessity and the persons/applications using the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Value Type
owl:Class.skos:definition: A class representing a set of values which classifies cultural values into certain categories. The type values varies based on application and should be assigned by the application or user coding information into the ontology.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person
owl:Class.skos:definition: This class typically only contains real persons living or dead.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: State
owl:Class.rdfs:seeAlso: (From CRM) - This class comprises the states of objects characterised by a certain condition over a time-span. An instance of this class describes the prevailing physical condition of any material object or feature during a specific E52 Time Span. In general, the time-span for which a certain condition can be asserted may be shorter than the real time-span, for which this condition held. The nature of that condition can be described using P2 has type. For example, the E3 Condition State condition of the SS Great Britain between 22 September 1846 and 27 August 1847 can be characterized as E55 Type wrecked.
owl:Class.skos:definition: A static condition c of something at some time t

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time Period
owl:Class.rdfs:seeAlso:
(From CRM) - This class comprises sets of coherent phenomena or cultural manifestations occurring in time and space.
It is the social or physical coherence of these phenomena that identify an E4 Period and not the associated spatiotemporal extent. This extent is only the "ground" or space in an abstract physical sense that the actual process of growth, spread and retreat has covered. Consequently, different periods can overlap and coexist in time and space, such as when a nomadic culture exists in the same area and time as a sedentary culture. This also means that overlapping land use rights, common among first nations, amounts to overlapping periods.
owl:Class.skos:definition: A block of time with a starting and end point.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Place
owl:Class.rdfs:seeAlso: (From CRM) - This class comprises extents in space, in particular on the surface of the earth, in the pure sense of physics: independent from temporal phenomena and matter. The instances of E53 Place are usually determined by reference to the position of immobile objects such as buildings, cities, mountains, rivers, or dedicated geodetic marks. A Place can be determined by combining a frame of reference and a location with respect to this frame. It may be identified by one or more instances of E44 Place Appellation. It is sometimes argued that instances of E53 Place are best identified by global coordinates or absolute reference systems. However, relative references are often more relevant in the context of cultural documentation and tend to be more precise. In particular, we are often interested in position in relation to large, mobile objects, such as ships. For example, the Place at which Nelson died is known with reference to a large mobile object H.M.S Victory. A resolution of this Place in terms of absolute coordinates would require knowledge of the movements of the vessel and the precise time of death, either of which may be revised, and the result would lack historical and cultural relevance. Any object can serve as a frame of reference for E53 Place determination. The model foresees the notion of a "section" of an E19 Physical Object as a valid E53 Place determination.
owl:Class.skos:definition: A physical region in space-time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event
owl:Class.rdfs:seeAlso: (From CRM) - This class comprises changes of states in cultural, social or physical systems, regardless of scale, brought about by a series or group of coherent physical, cultural, technological or legal phenomena.
owl:Class.skos:definition: A collection of actions, agents, outcomes and the environment in which they come together, bounded by variables of time

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Group
owl:Class.skos:definition: (From CRM) - This class comprises any gatherings or organizations of E39 Actors that act collectively or in a similar way due to any form of unifying relationship. In the wider sense this class also comprises official positions which used to be regarded in certain contexts as one actor, independent of the current holder of the office, such as the president of a country. In such cases, it may happen that the Group never had more than one member. A joint pseudonym (i.e., a name that seems indicative of an individual but that is actually used as a persona by two or more people) is a particular case of E74 Group. A gathering of people becomes an E74 Group when it exhibits organizational characteristics usually typified by a set of ideas or beliefs held in common, or actions performed together. These might be communication, creating some common artifact, a common purpose such as study, worship, business, sports, etc. Nationality can be modeled as membership in an E74 Group (cf. HumanML markup). Married couples and other concepts of family are regarded as particular examples of E74 Group.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: skos:Concept
owl:Class.skos:definition: A concept is an abstract representation of a thing as it is understood.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: foaf:Organization
owl:Class.skos:definition: (From FOAF) - The Organization class represents a kind of Agent corresponding to social instititutions such as companies, societies etc.
